statements: SELECT * FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_coverage FROM employee_benefits WHERE insurance_coverage > 500;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE retirement_plan <= 1000;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_coverage, retirement_plan FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits ORDER BY retirement_plan DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_coverage, retirement_plan FROM employee_benefits WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_benefits WHERE insurance_coverage > 5000 ORDER BY retirement_plan DESC;
SELECT AVG(insurance_coverage) AS average_insurance, MAX(retirement_plan) AS max_retirement FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT employee_id, insurance_coverage, retirement_plan FROM employee_benefits WHERE insurance_coverage BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, insurance_coverage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_benefits;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, insurance_coverage FROM employees WHERE retirement_plan > 0;
SELECT * FROM benefits WHERE coverage_amount >= 1000;
SELECT employee_name, benefits.benefit_type FROM employees JOIN benefits ON employees.employee_id = benefits.benefit_id;
SELECT MAX(retirement_plan) AS max_retirement FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE insurance_coverage > 1000 ORDER BY employee_id DESC, employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_name, insurance_coverage FROM employees WHERE retirement_plan >= 5000
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, insurance_coverage, retirement_plan FROM employees WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN benefits ON employees.employee_id = benefits.benefit_id WHERE benefits.coverage_amount > 2000
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employees WHERE insurance_coverage < 500
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_type, start_date FROM insurance_coverage WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT plan_type, contribution FROM retirement_plans ORDER BY contribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY department, hire_date;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees JOIN insurance_coverage ON employees.employee_id = insurance_coverage.employee_id WHERE coverage_type = 'health';

SELECT employees.name, retirement_plans.plan_type, retirement_plans.contribution FROM employees JOIN retirement_plans ON employees.employee_id = retirement_plans.employee_id WHERE retirement_plans.contribution > 5000 ORDER BY employees.name;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND department <> 'HR';
SELECT * FROM insurance_coverage;
SELECT employee_id, coverage_type FROM insurance_coverage WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_info WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM benefits_history ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(contribution_amount) FROM retirement_plans;
SELECT * FROM insurance_coverage WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_info WHERE employee_department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, event_date, event_description FROM benefits_history WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_type, contribution_amount FROM retirement_plans WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_id, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM insurance_coverage JOIN employee_info ON insurance_coverage.employee_id = employee_info.employee_id WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM insurance_coverage ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT employee_id, coverage_type FROM insurance_coverage WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM retirement_plans WHERE contribution < 500;
SELECT dependent_name, relationship FROM dependents ORDER BY dependent_id ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department FROM employee_info
SELECT * FROM retirement_plans ORDER BY contribution DESC
SELECT e.employee_name, b.benefit_type, b.coverage FROM employee_info AS e JOIN employee_benefits AS b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id
SELECT coverage_type, MAX(coverage_amount) AS max_coverage FROM insurance_coverage GROUP BY coverage_type
SELECT d.dependent_name, e.employee_name, d.relationship FROM dependents AS d JOIN employee_info AS e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id
